chat.msg: Hello! Welcome to our map navigation game. Are you ready to navigate through the map and follow the path?
Great! Let's begin. You are currently at the top-right corner of the map. Move a few steps to the left.

Good job! Now, you should see a small island on your left with a leopard resting on it. We need to pass just below the leopard. Can you find a path that leads you safely below the leopard on the island?

Perfect! Now, look for a wooden twig that connects the small island with a larger island. Cross the wooden twig and make your way to the larger island. On this island, you'll find a parrot and an elephant. Move over the head of the parrot and continue going down (south) between the parrot and the elephant.

Well done! You're doing great so far. Now, leave the island with the parrot and the elephant in a south-eastern direction. You'll come across three rocks, two gray ones, and a darker one. Cross over these rocks and continue on your path.

Fantastic! You're making excellent progress. After crossing the rocks, you'll reach a new island with a frog on it. Go below (south of) the frog and then make a u-turn to the left (west). Keep going in this direction.

Great job! You're doing amazing so far. Now, you'll reach an island with a crocodile on it. Cross over the back of the crocodile and head back to the island with the parrot and the elephant, but this time go left (west). Keep going in this direction.

You're doing fantastic! Keep up the good work. Now, you'll come across two gray rocks. Cross over these rocks towards an island with a giraffe on it. The giraffe is located on the left side of the map. Go below (south-west) the giraffe and then make a 90-degree turn to the left (south-east). Keep following this direction.
Amazing job! You're almost there. Now, you'll reach another island with a snake on it. Cross over the snake and continue on your path. You're almost at your final destination! Keep going.

chat.msg: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Can you reach the end of the maze

Of course! I can definitely help you navigate through the maze. Let's get started! You're currently at the top-right corner of the map, where a white dog is sitting. To start, take a few steps to your left (west) and you'll see a wooden bench. Can you see it?

Great! Now, from the wooden bench, go straight down and you'll come across a stream. Cross the stream and head towards the Florist Stand. But don't reach the stand just yet! Once you're close to it, make a left turn and cross the stream again. Can you find your way back to the white dog near the stream? Let me know when you're there.

Fantastic! Now, just near the white dog, you'll notice a wooden branch crossing a river. Cross the branch and continue going south (down the map). Keep moving until you reach another white dog sitting next to a red and white checkered picnic. Can you see the dog and the picnic?

Great job! Now, walk over the picnic mat, careful not to disturb the bowl of berries, and continue heading west. You'll come across another wooden branch that crosses the river. Cross the branch to the north side of the river and keep going. 

Once you have crossed the river, you'll notice a green bush. Instead of going directly to the bush, circle around it from the right side. This will lead you to the Florist Stand. 

When you reach the stand, turn left (west) and go below it. You will then spot a big bridge with two people riding a bicycle. Pass to the west of the bridge. Can you see the bridge and the cyclists?

Great job! Just past the bridge, you'll see two elderly people sitting on a bench and reading newspapers. Take a few steps south, between the old people and another wooden branch. Keep going until you reach a green bush next to the end of the wooden branch. Once you're there, turn east, moving between the branch and the bush. Can you see the green bush next to the end of the wooden branch?

Awesome! Now, head east for a few steps and you'll come across a brown young deer. Congratulations, you've reached your final destination! Well done on navigating the path through the map. Enjoy your time with the brown young deer! Let me know if there's anything else I can help you with.

chat.msg: Hello! Are you ready for an adventure? We're going to navigate through a map together. I'll be your instructor and you'll be the navigator. Are you excited?

Awesome! Let's get started. You are currently at the opening of a tent at the top (north) part of the map. Take a few steps south of the tent and you'll see a trail. Follow that trail and you'll come across a cute little puppy.

Great job! Now, from the puppy, turn left (east) and continue walking a few steps. You'll reach a small bonfire north of the trail. Once you spot the bonfire, leave the trail and pass it on the left (north) side. Keep going east on the trail until you pass under two red mushrooms.

Fantastic! Now that you've passed under the red mushrooms, you'll see a blue car up ahead. But don't touch the car! Instead, make a right U-turn and start heading back west. Keep going until you reach a fork in the road. At the fork, take the left (south) branch and continue on that path. You'll come across a telescope on your right.

Well done! Now, veer right and take an off-trail shortcut around the telescope. Once you're past the telescope, make sure to return to the trail. You're doing great so far!

Next, continue heading west on the trail. But keep a sharp eye out for a low wall of rocks that surround a wooden cabin. When you spot it, leave the trail and cross over the low wall of rocks to reach the cabin. That's your final destination!

You're almost there! Let me know when you've made it to the wooden cabin.
